bug.short_desc: quiterss cores when refreshing rss feeds in QMetaObject::className() const () from /lib64/libQt5Core.so.5
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
refreshing the rss feeds caused a core.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
every tome
Steps to Reproduce: 1.launch quiterss 2.click on the 'update all feeds' icon 3.
Actual results:
cores Expected results: should refresh rss feeds
Additional info:
ran under gdb and got this backtrace when it cores
Thread 1 "quiterss" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. 0x00007fff6306e7f7 in QMetaObject::className() const () from /lib64/libQt5Core.so.5 (gdb) bt #0 0x00007fff6306e7f7 in QMetaObject::className() const () at /lib64/libQt5Core.so.5 #1 0x00007fff783da04f in QMetaTypeIdQObject<QWidget*, 8>::qt_metatype_id() () at /lib64/libQt5Widgets.so.5 #2 0x00007fff78373a47 in _GLOBAL__sub_I_qwidgetsvariant.cpp () at /lib64/libQt5Widgets.so.5 #3 0x00007ffff7de8daa in call_init.part () at /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 #4 0x00007ffff7de8ebb in _dl_init () at /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 #5 0x00007ffff7dedab1 in dl_open_worker () at /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 #6 0x00007ffff7de8c54 in _dl_catch_error () at /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 #7 0x00007ffff7ded009 in _dl_open () at /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 #8 0x00007ffff26fcf09 in dlopen_doit () at /lib64/libdl.so.2 #9 0x00007ffff7de8c54 in _dl_catch_error () at /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 #10 0x00007ffff26fd591 in _dlerror_run () at /lib64/libdl.so.2 #11 0x00007ffff26fcfa2 in dlopen@@GLIBC_2.2.5 () at /lib64/libdl.so.2 #12 0x00007fff7ab62d10 in module_Load () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #13 0x00007fff7ab4e26b in module_InitDynamic () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #14 0x00007fff7ab4e5ca in AllocatePluginDir () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #15 0x00007fff7ab4e529 in AllocatePluginDir () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #16 0x00007fff7ab4e93a in AllocatePluginPath () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #17 0x00007fff7ab4ee4a in module_LoadPlugins () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #18 0x00007fff7aaedb32 in libvlc_InternalInit () at /lib64/libvlccore.so.8 #19 0x00007fff7a8c01da in libvlc_new () at /lib64/libvlc.so.5 #20 0x00007fff7ade8f1b in LibVLC::init() () at /usr/lib64/kde4/plugins/phonon_backend/phonon_vlc.so #21 0x00007fff7adca4f3 in Phonon::VLC::Backend::Backend(QObject*, QList<QVariant> const&) () at /usr/lib64/kde4/plugins/phonon_backend/phonon_vlc.so #22 0x00007fff7adcb1b3 in qt_plugin_instance () at /usr/lib64/kde4/plugins/phonon_backend/phonon_vlc.so #23 0x00007ffff3901133 in QPluginLoader::instance() () at /lib64/libQtCore.so.4 #24 0x00007ffff51c75c8 in Phonon::FactoryPrivate::tryCreateBackend(QString const&) () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #25 0x00007ffff51c76a2 in Phonon::FactoryPrivate::createSuitableBackend(QString const&, QList<QString> const&) () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #26 0x00007ffff51c9bad in Phonon::FactoryPrivate::createBackend() () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #27 0x00007ffff51ca218 in Phonon::Factory::backend(bool) () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #28 0x00007ffff51ca8f2 in Phonon::Factory::createAudioOutput(QObject*) () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #29 0x00007ffff51c1eff in Phonon::AudioOutputPrivate::createBackendObject() () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #30 0x00007ffff51bf6c4 in Phonon::AudioOutputPrivate::init(Phonon::Category) () at /lib64/libphonon.so.4 #31 0x00005555556d80d5 in MainWindow::slotPlaySound(QString const&) () #32 0x00005555556d8358 in MainWindow::slotPlaySoundNewNews() () #33 0x00005555557394be in MainWindow::qt_static_metacall(QObject*, QMetaObject::Call, int, void**) () #34 0x00007ffff393840c in QObject::event(QEvent*) () at /lib64/libQtCore.so.4 #35 0x00007ffff42260dc in QWidget::event(QEvent*) () at /lib64/libQtGui.so.4 #36 0x00007ffff4605f43 in QMainWindow::event(QEvent*) () at /lib64/libQtGui.so.4 #37 0x00007ffff41ceeff in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*) () at /lib64/libQtGui.so.4 #38 0x00007ffff41d5e4f in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) () at /lib64/libQtGui.so.4 #39 0x00007ffff391e431 in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*) () at /lib64/libQtCore.so.4
As of the latest update (01/07/2016) things are working correctly.
